favourite.article: There's no children's mtg here so I have to be the shepherd to my kids and I'll be teaching them this song today. Indeed, let's be happy, rejoicing whatever the circumstance and wherever we are.
I like this song very much. That's why even today I still enjoy it, together with my kids.
It's a lively and commonly sung hymn, especially loved by most kids.
The loveliest song over years, we sung it when I was young, and now I always ensure children enjoy it while I teach sunday school in Uganda.
